verses.1: Tua laitakin leitung buppi in kampau khat le kammal tawmno bek nei hi.
verses.2: Amaute nisuahna lamah lal uh a, Shinar gam sungah zanglei mun khat mu-in tua lai ah a teeng uh hi.
verses.3: Amaute khatlekhat kiangah, “Hong pai un, leiseek seekin limtakin hal ni,” kici uh hi. Amaute in suang dingin leiseek nei uh a, a buan dingin kultal tui nei uh hi.
verses.4: Tua ciangin amaute in, “Hong pai un, leitung buppi ah eite i kithehthang gawp loh nadingin ei adingin khuapi khat bawlin, a dawn in vantung a ban ding tausang khat lamin, eiteʼ minthan nading khat bawl ni,” ci uh hi.
verses.5: Tua ciangin mihingteʼ lam sa khuapi le tausangpi a en dingin Topa hong pai suk hi.
verses.6: Topa in, “En un, amaute minam khat hi uh a, amaute khempeuh in kampau khat nei uh hi. Hih pen amauʼ sep ding a kipatna bek ahi hi. Tu-in sep dinga amauʼ vaihawmte amau adingin hi thei nawn lo ding hi.
verses.7: Hong pai un, amau thugen khatlekhat a kitheih loh nadingun eite pai sukin amauʼ kampau va kitukalhsak ni,” a ci hi.
verses.8: Tua ahih ciangin Topa in tua lai panin leitung khempeuh ah amaute thehthang a, a khuapi bawl uh a tawp uh hi.
verses.9: Tua ahih ciangin a min Babel kici hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in tua munah leitung khempeuhʼ kampau kitukalhsak hi. Tua lai mun panin Topa in leitung khempeuh ah amaute a thehthang hi.
verses.10: Hihte pen Shemʼ suanlekhakte ahi hi. Shem kum za khat a phak, tuiciin tun khit kum nih ciangin, amah in Arpakshad kici tapa khat nei hi.
verses.11: Arpakshad a suah khit ciangin Shem kum za khat nungta lai a, tanu le tapa dang nei lai hi.
verses.12: Arpakshad kum sawm thum le kum nga a phak khit ciangin, amah in Shelah kici tapa khat nei hi.
verses.13: Shelah a suah khit ciangin Arpakshad kum za li le kum sawm thum nungta lai a, tanu le tapa dang nei lai hi.
verses.14: Shelah kum sawm thum a phak khit ciangin Eber kici tapa khat nei hi.
verses.15: Eberʼ suah khit ciangin Shelah kum za li le kum sawm thum nungta lai a, tanu le tapa dang nei lai hi.
verses.16: Eber kum sawm thum le kum li a phak khit ciangin amah in Peleg kici tapa khat nei hi.
verses.17: Peleg a suah khit ciangin Eber kum za li le kum sawm thum nungta lai a, tanu le tapa dang nei lai hi.
verses.18: Peleg kum sawm thum a phak khit ciangin amah in Reu kici tapa khat nei hi.
verses.19: Reu a suah khit ciangin Peleg kum za nih le kum kua nungta lai a, tanu le tapa dang nei lai hi.
verses.20: Reu kum sawm thum le nih a phak khit ciangin amah in Serug kici tapa khat nei hi.
verses.21: Serug a suah khit ciangin Reu kum za nih le kum sagih nungta lai a, tanu le tapa dang nei lai hi.
verses.22: Serug kum sawm thum a phak khit ciangin amah in Nahor kici tapa khat nei hi.
verses.23: Nahor a suah khit ciangin Serug kum za nih nungta lai a, tanu le tapa dang nei lai hi.
verses.24: Nahor kum sawm nih le kua a phak khit ciangin amah in Terah kici tapa khat nei hi.
verses.25: Terah a suah khit ciangin Nahor kum za le kum sawm le kum kua nungta lai a, tanu le tapa dang nei lai hi.
verses.26: Terah kum sawm sagih a phak khit ciangin amah in Abram, Nahor le Haran a nei hi.
verses.27: Tu-in Terahʼ suanlekhakte hih bang ahi hi. Terah pen Abram, Nahor le Haranʼ pa hi a, Haran pen Lotʼ pa ahi hi.
verses.28: Ama pa Terah a sih ma-in ama suahna gam ahi, Khaldea gam Ur khua ah Haran si hi.
verses.29: Abram le Nahor in zi nei uh hi. Abramʼ zi min Sarai hi a, Nahorʼ zi min Milkah hi a, Milkah pen Iskahʼ pa Haranʼ tanu ahi hi.
verses.30: Tu-in Sarai ciing a, ta nei lo hi.
verses.31: Terah in ama tapa Abram le Haranʼ tapa, ama tupa ahi Lot le a tapa Abramʼ zi ahi a monu Sarai samin, Kanaan gam sungah a pai dingin Khaldea gam Ur khua panin amaute a paikhia khawm uh hi. Ahi zongin amaute Haran a tun uh ciangin tua munah a teeng uh hi.
verses.32: Terahʼ khan sung kum za nih le kum nga hi a, Haran ah Terah a si hi.
